docs.lead_paragraph: An end to a 47-year requirement that pilots retire at 60 would bring the United States in line with international practice.

headline.main: F.A.A. to Propose Letting Airline Pilots Fly Until Age 65
headline.print_headline: F.A.A. to Propose Letting Airline Pilots Fly Until Age 65

docs.snippet: An end to a 47-year requirement that pilots retire at 60 would bring the United States in line with international practice.

docs.lead_paragraph: The head of the Federal Aviation Administration said today that the agency would propose allowing airline pilots to fly until they are 65 years old.

headline.main: F.A.A. to Propose Raising Pilots’ Retirement Age
headline.print_headline: F.A.A. to Propose Raising Pilots’ Retirement Age

docs.snippet: The head of the Federal Aviation Administration said today that the agency would propose allowing airline pilots to fly until they are 65 years old.

docs.lead_paragraph: Cancer is less common in adolescents and young adults than in older people. But in some ways it is more alarming.

headline.main: Too Young for This: Facing Cancer Under 40
headline.print_headline: Too Young for This: Facing Cancer Under 40

docs.snippet: Cancer is less common in adolescents and young adults than in older people. But in some ways it is more alarming.
